short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds ability to adjust volume while holding right click and scrolling.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is open-source: https://github.com/AkshatKejriwal/KickScroll

Enhance your video streaming experience with intuitive, on-screen volume control! This extension allows you to adjust video volume easily by simply right-clicking and scrolling on the video. 

Key Features:
    Smooth Volume Control with Right-Click Scroll: Right-click and scroll up to increase or down to decrease the video volume in increments, with visual feedback showing the current volume level.

    On-Screen Volume Indicator: A sleek, centered overlay displays the current volume percentage, fading out after adjustments for a clean viewing experience.

    Volume Slider Synchronization: The extension automatically aligns with the volume slider in the player controls, updating it visually to reflect any adjustments you make by scrolling.
